summary.title: Juice Shop Lab
summary.description:
Local OWASP Juice Shop deployment in a Docker container. 
Users connect via browser on port 3000 or through an optional reverse proxy with TLS and security headers. 
The app may persist logs/files on a host volume and send outbound requests to Email/SMS or webhook providers.

diagrams.title: Juice Shop Data Flow Diagram
diagrams.description: Data flow diagram showing User, Attacker, Juice Shop container, optional Reverse Proxy, Persistent Storage, and outbound flows to Email/SMS provider or webhook endpoints. Trust boundaries: Internet → Host → Container Network.
